name: Golden Software Boundary File
summary: Learn about .GSB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Several prefabricated GSB files are made available at the Golden Software website so that users don't have to make geographical boundaries from scratch.

description: GIS file used by spatial visualization and mapping products developed by Golden Software; contains geographical boundaries, such as country, state, or county boundaries; used for importing boundaries and then overlaying them with spatial data sets.
